import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
        for (int t = 1; true; t++) {
            int n = input.nextInt();
            if (n == 0) break;
            int[] num = new int[n];
            int sum = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) sum += num[i] = input.nextInt();
            Arrays.sort(num);
            int mid = sum / n;
            int moves = 0;
            for (int i = 0; num[i] < mid; i++) moves += mid - num[i];
            System.out.println("Set #" + t + "\nThe minimum number of moves is " + moves + ".\n");
        }
    }

}
